page.title: 08SPARK MAGAZINE P2
page.content: Q.Does it cost a lot of money to make the magazine ? A.It costs Â£180 to Â£200 to make each batch but it could not be possible without advertising. Q.Where do you get the stories from ? A.They come from schools,churches etc. Q.How much does it cost to advertise ? A.Â£26-full page,Â£13-\ page,Â£7-quarter page,Â£3.50-small block. Q.How long does it take to make ? A.It take 8 weeks per edition. Q.How many copies have you made ? A.We have made 3 so far. Q.Are you happy with the information? A.Yes we are happy because the reports we get are very interesting. Q.Do you have any trouble getting information ? A.The only trouble is getting the information in time for printing.
